did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Joseph Hansen Papers,

physdesc.label: Collection Size
physdesc.extent: 109 manuscript boxes, 1 oversize box, 3 envelopes, 1 phonotape cassette

did.abstract: Speeches and writings, correspondence, notes, minutes, reports, internal bulletins, resolutions, theses, printed matter, sound recording, and photographs, relating to Leon Trotsky, activities of the Socialist Workers Party in the United States, and activities of the Fourth International in Latin America, Western Europe and elsewhere.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research but may not be photocopied.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Joseph Hansen Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1992.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

did.unittitle: BIOGRAPHICAL FILE, 1930-1979.

scopecontent.p: Genealogical writings, printed matter, obituaries, condolence letters, memorial meeting addresses, memorabilia, and miscellany, relating to the family, student years, and death of Joseph Hansen. Arranged alphabetically by topic.

did.unittitle: CORRESPONDENCE, 1913-1980.

scopecontent.p: Correspondence of Joseph Hansen arranged alphabetically by name of correspondent. Correspondence of Reba Hansen, wife of Joseph Hansen, is interfiled. Nationality or country of residence of correspondents is indicated when other than United States.

did.unittitle: SPEECHES AND WRITINGS, 1928-1978.

scopecontent.p: Speeches and writings by Joseph Hansen arranged chronologically.

did.unittitle: EDITORIAL FILE, 1924-1979.

scopecontent.p: Speeches and writings by others, with editorial annotations or other handwritten commentary by Joseph Hansen. In many, but not all, cases, annotations reflect planned publication in journals edited by Hansen. Arranged alphabetically by author.

did.unittitle: REBA HANSEN FILE, 1928-1979.

scopecontent.p: Papers of Reba Hansen (1909-1990), wife of Joseph Hansen, business manager of Intercontinental Press, and Socialist Workers Party member, including speeches and writings, and miscellany, arranged by physical form.

did.unittitle: BEATRICE HANSEN FILE, 1945-1969.

scopecontent.p: Papers of Beatrice Hansen (1925-1969), sister-in-law of Joseph Hansen, and member of the National Committee of the Socialist Workers Party, including correspondence, speeches and writings, and personal documents, arranged by physical form.

did.unittitle: LEON TROTSKY FILE, 1903-1979.

scopecontent.p: Originals and copies of correspondence and speeches and writings of the Russian revolutionary Leon Trotsky (1879-1940); correspondence, writings, and memoranda of members of his household and other associates; and collected printed matter and copies of government documents relating to him. Arranged by physical form.

did.unittitle: NATALIIA SEDOVA TROTSKAIA FILE, 1940-1963.

scopecontent.p: Originals and copies of correspondence and speeches and writings of Nataliia Sedova Trotskaia (1882-1962), wife of Leon Trotsky; and collected printed matter relating to her. Arranged by physical form.

did.unittitle: FOURTH INTERNATIONAL FILE, 1930-1980.

scopecontent.p: Correspondence, writings, internal bulletins, resolutions, statements, reports, memoranda, serial issues, pamphlets, and clippings by or about the Fourth International and other Trotskyist-derived groups. Includes internal and public issuances of the Fourth International, its various national sections, and other Trotskyist groups; correspondence of Fourth International leaders; correspondence of Socialist Workers Party leaders on international topics; internal and public issuances of the Socialist Workers Party on international topics; and material relating to the Fourth International, but generated outside it. Does not include writings or correspondence of Joseph Hansen. Arranged alphabetically by country.

did.unittitle: SOCIALIST WORKERS PARTY FILE, 1929-1979.

scopecontent.p: Correspondence, writings, discussion documents, resolutions, reports, memoranda, minutes, and printed matter, by or about the Socialist Workers Party. Includes correspondence of party leaders on domestic topics; internal and public issuances of the party on domestic topics; and material relating to the party but generated outside it. Does not include writings or correspondence of Joseph Hansen. Arranged by physical form.

did.unittitle: SUBJECT FILE, 1887-1978.

scopecontent.p: Collected pamphlets, serial issues, printed articles, clippings, leaflets, bulletins, newsletters, and miscellany, arranged alphabetically by topic.

did.unittitle: OVERSIZE FILE, 1976-1977.

scopecontent.p: Large format publications.

did.unittitle: INDEXES.

scopecontent.p: Indexes prepared by Library of Social History prior to present arrangement of collection.

did.unittitle: PHONOTAPE, 1977.

scopecontent.p: Sound recording of speech by Joseph Hansen.

did.unittitle: PHOTOGRAPHS, ca. 1900-1975.

scopecontent.p: Prints of Joseph Hansen, family members, and acquaintances.

did.unittitle: INCREMENT, 1927-1972.

scopecontent.p: Pamphlets produced by Hansen and yearbook, received after the bulk of the collection was processed, arranged in two subseries, Biographical File and Speeches and Writings.

INDEXES.

Partial indexes prepared by Library of Social History, 1983-1984, to writings by Joseph Hansen in Joseph Hansen Papers, prior to present arrangement of collection. To correlate former locations listed in indexes with present locations, check data field TYP[e], which appears in every index. If TYP is coded L (for letter), turn to Letters Index and locate desired item alphabetically under name appearing in ADDRESSEE data field. All items in Letters Index are annotated to indicate box and folder number of present location. If TYP is not coded L, turn to Chronological Index and locate desired item chronologically under date appearing in ITEM# data field. All items in Chronological Index except those coded L are annotated to indicate box and folder number of present location. Note: Indexes do not include all writings or letters by Hansen
